metadata.title: CVE-2024-11858 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Radare2, which contains a command injectionvulnerability caused by insufficient input validation when handling PebbleApplication files. Maliciously crafted inputs can inject shell commandsduring command parsing, leading to unintended behavior during fileprocessing?

criterions.comment: radare2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
